name: Breka Bakery & Cafe
address: 6533 Fraser St, Vancouver, BC V5X 3T4, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Tuxedo Truffle
hasMenuItem.description: A marbled sponge with rich dark chocolate and white chocolate cream filling, topped with dark chocolate and white chocolate ganache!

hasMenuItem.name: Tiramisu
hasMenuItem.description: This light and creamy dessert is filled with an espresso infused mousse over lady fingers soaked in Kahlua and vanilla sponge!

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Eclair
hasMenuItem.description: A light and hollow pastry filled with whipped cream, custard, and dipped in dark chocolate

hasMenuItem.name: Red Velvet
hasMenuItem.description: Rosy-red layers of chocolate sponge, smothered in cream cheese frosting, and chunks of chocolate truffle pieces inside!

hasMenuItem.name: Cretzel Ham&Cheese Melt

hasMenuItem.description: Light and fluffy vanilla sponge, brushed with our strawberry reduction sauce, and juicy chunks of strawberry inside

review.reviewBody: Breka, consistently delivers fresh baked goods. I highly recommend their donuts there's a lot of filling in them and the best part is, they are open 24/7 to satisfy all your late night cravings
so delicious!! the grilled cheese was decadent and airy. i love it! the pickle was refreshing and the perfect touch. 10/10 would get again

I love their coffee and veggie sandwich. Too bad they don't offer a vegan sandwich or a vegan pocket. With so many vegan cheese and meat alternatives on the market, I'm sure they could come up with something yummy! They'll gain more clients too!

This place is amazing. I'm obsessed with the raspberry cheese strudel. My bf and I agree their doughnuts are better than anywhere else. Basically I love everything I've tried there. I highly recommend this place.
The Lavender Lemonade was so fresh and mildly sweet. The lavender flavour was also not overwhelming and just right. I would recommend getting this if you want a light refresher.
